func.title: SortArrayByProperty

param.name: array2sort
param.desc: Array that is to be sorted

param.name: property_name
param.desc: Name of property by which the array is to be sorted

param.name: descending
param.desc: If true, elements are sorted in descending (highest to lowest) order. Otherwise ascending order.

func.desc: Sorts an array of proplists by a property. All elements must be proplists. Properties should be either all strings or all integer. If a property is not assigned, it is assumed to be integer zero.
